adjective.description: Having or relating to subjects or a particular subject.
examples: the orientation of this anthology is essentially thematic

adjective.description: Belonging to, relating to, or denoting the theme of a sentence.

noun.description: A body of topics for study or discussion.
A postage stamp forming part of a set with designs connected with the same subject; a topical.

origin: Late 17th century: from Greek thematikos, from thema (see theme).
